tiloka 'aAya`tu {lokita`bi {loHakiymi
hudFY waraHomapF l~ilomuHosiniyna
{l~a*iyna yuqiymuwna {lS~alaw`pa wayu&otuwna {lz~akaw`pa wahum bi{lo'aAxirapi humo yuwqinuwna
>uw@la`^}ika EalaY` hudFY m~in r~ab~ihimo wa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomufoliHuwna
wamina {ln~aAsi man ya$otariY lahowa {loHadiyvi liyuDil~a Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi bigayori EilomK wayat~axi*ahaA huzuwFA >uw@la`^}ika lahumo Ea*aAbN m~uhiynN
wa<i*aA tutolaY` Ealayohi 'aAya`tunaA wal~aY` musotakobirFA ka>an l~amo yasomaEohaA ka>an~a fiY^ >u*unayohi waqorFA faba$~irohu biEa*aAbK >aliymK
<in~a {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti lahumo jan~a`tu {ln~aEiymi
xa`lidiyna fiyhaA waEoda {ll~ahi Haq~FA wahuwa {loEaziyzu {loHakiymu

xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti bigayori EamadK tarawonahaA wa>aloqaY` fiY {lo>aroDi rawa`siYa >an tamiyda bikumo wabav~a fiyhaA min kul~i daA^b~apK wa>anzalonaA mina {ls~amaA^'i maA^'F fa>an[batonaA fiyhaA min kul~i zawojK kariymK
ha`*aA xaloqu {ll~ahi fa>aruwniY maA*aA xalaqa {l~a*iyna min duwnihi. bali {lZ~a`limuwna fiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK
walaqado 'aAtayonaA luqoma`na {loHikomapa >ani {$okuro lil~ahi waman ya$okuro fa<in~amaA ya$okuru linafosihi. waman kafara fa<in~a {ll~aha ganiY~N HamiydN
wa<i*o qaAla luqoma`nu li{bonihi. wahuwa yaEiZuhu, ya`bunaY~a laA tu$oriko bi{ll~ahi <in~a {l$~iroka laZulomN EaZiymN
wawaS~ayonaA {lo<insa`na biwa`lidayohi Hamalatohu >um~uhu, wahonFA EalaY` wahonK wafiSa`luhu, fiY EaAmayoni >ani {$okuro liY waliwa`lidayoka <ilaY~a {lomaSiyru

wa<in ja`hadaAka EalaY`^ >an tu$orika biY maA layosa laka bihi. EilomN falaA tuTiEohumaA waSaAHibohumaA fiY {ld~unoyaA maEoruwfFA wa{t~abiEo sabiyla mano >anaAba <ilaY~a vum~a <ilaY~a marojiEukumo fa>unab~i}ukum bimaA kuntumo taEomaluwna
ya`bunaY~a <in~ahaA^ <in taku mivoqaAla Hab~apK m~ino xarodalK fatakun fiY SaxorapK >awo fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti >awo fiY {lo>aroDi ya>oti bihaA {ll~ahu <in~a {ll~aha laTiyfN xabiyrN
ya`bunaY~a >aqimi {lS~alaw`pa wa>omuro bi{lomaEoruwfi wa{noha Eani {lomunkari wa{Sobiro EalaY` maA^ >aSaAbaka <in~a *a`lika mino Eazomi {lo>umuwri
walaA tuSaE~iro xad~aka liln~aAsi walaA tamo$i fiY {lo>aroDi maraHFA <in~a {ll~aha laA yuHib~u kul~a muxotaAlK faxuwrK
wa{qoSido fiY ma$oyika wa{goDuDo min Sawotika <in~a >ankara {lo>aSowa`ti laSawotu {loHamiyri

>alamo tarawoA@ >an~a {ll~aha sax~ara lakum m~aA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wamaA fiY {lo>aroDi wa>asobaga Ealayokumo niEamahu, Za`hirapF wabaATinapF wamina {ln~aAsi man yuja`dilu fiY {ll~ahi bigayori EilomK walaA hudFY walaA kita`bK m~uniyrK
wa<i*aA qiyla lahumu {t~abiEuwA@ maA^ >anzala {ll~ahu qaAluwA@ balo nat~abiEu maA wajadonaA Ealayohi 'aAbaA^'anaA^ >awalawo kaAna {l$~ayoTa`nu yadoEuwhumo <ilaY` Ea*aAbi {ls~aEiyri
waman yusolimo wajohahu,^ <ilaY {ll~ahi wahuwa muHosinN faqadi {sotamosaka bi{loEurowapi {lowuvoqaY` wa<ilaY {ll~ahi Ea`qibapu {lo>umuwri
waman kafara falaA yaHozunka kuforuhu,^ <ilayonaA marojiEuhumo fanunab~i}uhum bimaA Eamiluw^A@ <in~a {ll~aha EaliymN[ bi*aAti {lS~uduwri
numat~iEuhumo qaliylFA vum~a naDoTar~uhumo <ilaY` Ea*aAbK galiyZK
wala}in sa>alotahum m~ano xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa layaquwlun~a {ll~ahu quli {loHamodu lil~ahi balo >akovaruhumo laA yaEolamuwna
lil~ahi maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi <in~a {ll~aha huwa {loganiY~u {loHamiydu
walawo >an~amaA fiY {lo>aroDi min $ajarapK >aqola`mN wa{lobaHoru yamud~uhu, min[ baEodihi. saboEapu >aboHurK m~aA nafidato kalima`tu {ll~ahi <in~a {ll~aha EaziyzN HakiymN
m~aA xaloqukumo walaA baEovukumo <il~aA kanafosK wa`HidapK <in~a {ll~aha samiyEN[ baSiyrN

>alamo tara >an~a {ll~aha yuwliju {l~ayola fiY {ln~ahaAri wayuwliju {ln~ahaAra fiY {l~ayoli wasax~ara {l$~amosa wa{loqamara kul~N yajoriY^ <ilaY`^ >ajalK m~usam~FY wa>an~a {ll~aha bimaA taEomaluwna xabiyrN
*a`lika bi>an~a {ll~aha huwa {loHaq~u wa>an~a maA yadoEuwna min duwnihi {loba`Tilu wa>an~a {ll~aha huwa {loEaliY~u {lokabiyru
>alamo tara >an~a {lofuloka tajoriY fiY {lobaHori biniEomati {ll~ahi liyuriyakum m~ino 'aAya`tihi.^ <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~ikul~i Sab~aArK $akuwrK
wa<i*aA ga$iyahum m~awojN ka{lZ~ulali daEawuA@ {ll~aha muxoliSiyna lahu {ld~iyna falam~aA naj~aY`humo <ilaY {lobar~i faminohum m~uqotaSidN wamaA yajoHadu bi_#aAya`tinaA^ <il~aA kul~u xat~aArK kafuwrK

ya`^>ay~uhaA {ln~aAsu {t~aquwA@ rab~akumo wa{xo$awoA@ yawomFA l~aA yajoziY waAlidN Ean waladihi. walaA mawoluwdN huwa jaAzK Ean waAlidihi. $ayo_#FA <in~a waEoda {ll~ahi Haq~N falaA tagur~an~akumu {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA walaA yagur~an~akum bi{ll~ahi {logaruwru

<in~a {ll~aha Eindahu, Eilomu {ls~aAEapi wayunaz~ilu {logayova wayaEolamu maA fiY {lo>aroHaAmi wamaA tadoriY nafosN m~aA*aA takosibu gadFA wamaA tadoriY nafosN[ bi>aY~i >aroDK tamuwtu <in~a {ll~aha EaliymN xabiyrN[
